Portraiture

Photo series

After years of experimenting with many forms of photography, portrait, street, and documentary photography is where I found my passion. My approach to portraiture is an almagamation of those styles. Though I no longer advertise myself as a photographer, I still enjoy this creative expression and still shoot to this day.
